entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Chipman
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:29 PM AST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -6.4°C
entry.summary:

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning this evening. Amount 5 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 7. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Rain or freezing rain. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy changing to freezing rain or ice pellets in the morning then to rain in the afternoon. Fog patches developing in the afternoon. Snow and ice pellet amount 10 cm. Rainfall amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High plus 5. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Rain. Low zero.
entry.summary: Rain. Risk of freezing rain before morning. Fog patches. Rainfall amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Thursday 12 January 2023
